rules_text:
Draw a card, then discard a card at random.
Add {R}.
Return target instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to your hand. Uriel deals 2 damage to you.
special_text:
[+1]: Draw a card, then discard a card at random.
[+1]: Add {R}.
[-X]: Return target instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to your hand. Uriel deals 2 damage to you.
